Frequently Asked Questions

How does the free plan work?

The Starter plan is completely free forever - unlimited menu items, basic dashboard, WhatsApp contact, and pickup orders. No hidden fees, no time limits, just free forever.

What's the difference between monthly and annual billing?

The Starter plan is completely free forever with all basic features. The Growth plan pricing varies: monthly billing at 99 AED/month (50% off) or annual billing at 79 AED/month (50% off the annual rate). Annual billing offers the same great discount with the convenience of paying once per year.

What's included in the Growth plan?

Growth plan includes access to delivery partners, marketing growth tools, improvement recommendations, meal boosts, delivery platform integration, advanced analytics, finance tracking, WhatsApp support, and restaurant logo display on GoSnel platform. Early partners get priority access to delivery & marketing services when they launch. Choose monthly (99 AED/month) or annual billing (79 AED/month) to save 20%.

Can I cancel anytime?

Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. There are no long-term contracts or cancellation fees.

How do I get started?

Simply sign up for free, add your menu items, and start receiving orders. Upgrading to Growth is optional and can be done anytime with your choice of monthly or annual billing.

Ready to start growing your restaurant?

Join hundreds of restaurants already using GoSnel to reach more customers.
